name: Run Rich Master: Doll Design
description:
Make a lot of money and take control of your life.
Try to collect as many money bills as possible along the journey to your destination to become rich and master your life like buying car, house, television, getting married, giving birth, buying diapers, milk, toys, traveling, clothes, shoes…
On the other hand, if you don't collect enough money, you will get poorer and risk losing everything!
